description: The `eldest daughter` of the Midarezaki family. Formerly known as Himemiya Senko, she is Yuuka`s biological sister and is the last to join the Midarezaki family. She was the former Solitary Doll before Yuuka was born. After Yuuka became the next Solitary Doll, she tortured her in various ways and even bribed her classmates to bully her. However, she remembered the promise with Kizakura Ginichi, now Midarezaki Ginka, and regrets her wrongdoings. She actually doesn`t have Enka`s DNA, but she becomes a member of `Cozy Family Operation` by Kyouka`s ability.
name: Midarezaki Chika
